com.keyboardr.glassremote.common.sender

Interface MessageSender<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of messages to be sent to the OutputStream
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StringMessageSender

    public interface MessageSender<T>
    Sends messages of type T to an OutputStream.
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendMessage(T message)
      Sends a message to the OutputStream.
      void setOutputStream(OutputStream output)
      Sets the OutputStream this MessageSender will send to.

    • Method Detail

      • setOutputStream

        void setOutputStream(OutputStream output)
        Sets the OutputStream this MessageSender will send to.
        Parameters:
        output - the OutputStream to send messages to

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(T message)
        Sends a message to the OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if setOutputStream(OutputStream) has not been called or was called with null output.
